prompts: Create a spooky ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a sandcastle with a playful personality.
I want a Pokemon that is inspired by beach elements, with sandy textures and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a water-type Pokemon that looks like a creature made from desert sands and has a unique battle style.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a sand dune, with a mysterious aura and mischievous behavior.
Imagine a ghostly Pokemon with a sandy appearance, perfect for battles in sandy environments and with a playful spirit.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of both sand and ghost, featuring a whimsical design and a love for the beach.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it was sculpted from sand, with an eerie smile and a knack for tricking opponents.
